mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS productCount , PR.PLANT_NO AS plantNo , PL.PLANT_NM AS productName , MIN(PRODUCT_PRICE) AS productPrice FROM PRODUCT AS PR INNER JOIN PLANT AS PL WHERE PRODUCT_ACTIVE != 0 AND PRODUCT_TYPE = 0 AND PR.PLANT_NO = PL.PLANT_NO
AND PR.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY PR.PLANT_NO
ORDER BY PR.PRODUCT_CREATETIME DESC
LIMIT #{beginPage}, #{pageSize}

SELECT PR.PRODUCT_NO AS PRODUCT_NO , PR.USER_NO AS USER_NO , PR.PLANT_NO AS PLANT_NO , PR.WH_PLANT_NO AS WH_PLANT_NO , PR.PLANT_SCORE_NO AS PLANT_SCORE_NO , PL.PLANT_NM AS PRODUCT_NAME , PR.PRODUCT_TYPE AS PRODUCT_TYPE , PR.PRODUCT_INSTANT AS PRODUCT_INSTANT , PR.PRODUCT_ACTIVE AS PRODUCT_ACTIVE , PR.PRODUCT_WEEKDAY_TF AS PRODUCT_WEEKDAY_TF , PR.PRODUCT_EXPTIME AS PRODUCT_EXPTIME , PR.PRODUCT_PRICE AS PRODUCT_PRICE , PR.PRODUCT_CREATETIME AS PRODUCT_CREATETIME , PR.PRODUCT_MODIFYTIME AS PRODUCT_MODIFYTIME FROM PRODUCT AS PR INNER JOIN PLANT AS PL ON PR.PLANT_NO = PL.PLANT_NO WHERE PRODUCT_ACTIVE != 0 AND PRODUCT_TYPE = 0 ORDER BY PRODUCT_CREATETIME DESC LIMIT #{beginPage}, #{pageSize}

SELECT PR.PLANT_NO AS plantNo , PL.PLANT_NM AS productName , MIN(PR.PRODUCT_PRICE) AS productPrice , PR.PRODUCT_TYPE AS productType , COUNT(*) AS productCount FROM PRODUCT AS PR INNER JOIN PLANT AS PL ON PR.PLANT_NO = PL.PLANT_NO WHERE PR.PRODUCT_ACTIVE != 0 AND PR.PRODUCT_TYPE = 0 AND PR.PLANT_NO = #{plantNo} GROUP BY PR.PLANT_NO

SELECT PR.PLANT_NO AS plantNo , PR.PRODUCT_NO AS productNo , PR.WH_PLANT_NO AS warehousePlantNo , PR.PLANT_SCORE_NO AS plantScoreNo , PS.PLANT_SCORE_NM AS plantScoreName , P.PLANT_NM AS productName , MIN(PR.PRODUCT_PRICE) AS productPrice FROM PRODUCT AS PR INNER JOIN PLANT AS P INNER JOIN PRODUCT_SCORE AS PS ON PS.PLANT_SCORE_NO = PR.PLANT_SCORE_NO AND P.PLANT_NO = PR.PLANT_NO WHERE PR.PRODUCT_ACTIVE != 0 AND PR.PLANT_NO = #{plantNo} AND PR.PRODUCT_TYPE = #{productType} AND PR.PRODUCT_INSTANT = #{productInstant} GROUP BY PS.PLANT_SCORE_NO ORDER BY PS.PLANT_SCORE_VAL DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS productCount , PR.PLANT_NO AS plantNo , PR.USER_NO AS userNo , PR.WH_PLANT_NO AS warehousePlantNo , PR.USER_PLANT_NO AS userPlantNo , IFNULL(( SELECT USER_PLANT_NM FROM USER_PLANT WHERE USER_PLANT_NO = PR.USER_PLANT_NO ), NULL) AS userPlantName , PL.PLANT_NM AS productName , PS.PLANT_SCORE_NO AS productScoreNo , PS.PLANT_SCORE_NM AS productScoreName , PR.PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice , PR.PRODUCT_TYPE AS productType , PR.PRODUCT_INSTANT AS productInstant , PR.PRODUCT_ACTIVE AS productActive , PR.PRODUCT_WEEKDAY_TF AS productWeekday , PR.PRODUCT_CREATETIME AS productCreatetime , PR.PRODUCT_MODIFYTIME AS productModifytime , PR.PRODUCT_BID_MILEAGE AS productMileageUsed FROM PRODUCT AS PR INNER JOIN PLANT AS PL INNER JOIN USER AS U INNER JOIN PRODUCT_SCORE AS PS ON PL.PLANT_NO = PR.PLANT_NO AND U.USER_NO = PR.USER_NO AND PS.PLANT_SCORE_NO = PR.PLANT_SCORE_NO WHERE PR.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY PR.PRODUCT_CREATETIME DESC LIMIT #{beginPage}, #{pageSize}
